DownREIT units
Down Real Estate Investment Trust Units Fair Value

Units of limited partnership interest in DownREITs which provide the DownREITs limited partners the ability to present all or some of their units for redemption for cash in the amount equal to the fair value of the company's common stock on or about the date of redemption. In lieu of cash redemption, the company may elect to exchange such units for an equal number of shares in the company's common stock.
